name: RockPaperScissors
0:
”Alexa, open rock paper scissors”
”New game”
”What's the score?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rock paper scissors
des:
The ultimate strategy game of rock paper scissors can now be played at home. Start the app and simply say: "Rock", or "Paper", or "Scissors" to make your move.

After playing a few games you can ask for stats on your play session. Say "What's the score?" to hear how you did.

If you want to clear the game scores, you can say "new game".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
